name: Zombie City
description: Are you ready for the zombie apocalypse? We've done the research and want to make sure you're prepared. Fought to the end. Requires the virtual reality headset.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 Storage: 500 MB available space
